page.title: 05WINDSOR GREAT PARK
page.content: {The }estate of Windsor Great Park employs 300 people and they have a variety of jobs.Some of which were gardeners, feeders of the deer, people in the office etc. {There}are 6000 acres of the Great Park 5000 of them are open to the public . Mr. Wiseman the estate manager said that Dukes Lane was named after a real Duke.Sandpit gate was built in 1820 and it was called Sandpit because there was a hill where the villagers got sand .Mr. Wiseman said that it was made of wood and it had been changed through the years .I asked him why was the Isle of Wight pond called that.He said because it was shaped like the Isle of Wight .
